InformativeText.Abstract: The Onboarding profile enables one device to configure another device in order to connect to a WiFi network.
InformativeText.Summary:
The Onboarding profile defines how one device that is connected to a wireless network (the onboarder) can use Bluetooth to bring another device (onboardee) onto that same wireless network.
The profile supports transferring the wireless configuration parameters from the onboarder onto the onboardee as well as having the onboardee report connection status in real-time via asynchronous alerts.
